item.title: The 6th Taikai
item.description: Dear members Information about The 6th Taikai. Date : November 23, 2017 10am-5pm Location : Tokyo Jitsugyo high school Kamata Ota Tokyo. Keiko schedule before The 6th Taikai at Esaka dojo Matsudo. Location : Matsudo Budo-kan at Matsudo sports park Saturday, November 4 Practice : 5pm - 7pm Sunday, November 5 Practice : 1pm - 3pm Saturday, November 11 Practice : 3pm - 6pm Sunday, November 12 Practice1 : 1pm -3pm
